extras.value: {     "schema_descriptor_version": 0.1,     "resource_type": "csv-observations-collection",      "description": "Hourly sunshine duration is given as sum of the six 10min intervals. For instance, the value for UTC 11 contains the sunshine from UTC 9:51-UTC 10:50",     "members": [{         "resource_name": ["5de42de9-db75-42e7-b9df-0a9f5ce4c724"],         "resource_type": "platforms",         "fields": [{             "field_id": "Stations_id",              "short_name": "station ID",             "long_name": "Station identifier",             "description": "The Identifier for the station declared by the German weather service (DWD)",             "field_type": "Integer"         }, {             "field_id": "von_datum",              "short_name": "start date",             "long_name": "Starting date",             "description": "Date for the first available observations",             "field_type": "Date",             "date_format": "YYYYMMDD"         }, {             "field_id": "bis_datum",              "short_name": "last date",             "long_name": "Last date",             "description": "Date for the last available observations",             "field_type": "Date",             "date_format": "YYYYMMDD"         }, {             "field_id": "Stationshoehe",              "short_name": "altitude",             "long_name": "Altitude",             "description": "The Altitude of the station above sea level",             "phenomenon": "altitude",             "uom": "m",             "field_type": "Integer"         }, {             "field_id": "geoBreite",              "short_name": "lat",             "long_name": "Latitude",             "description": "The latitude position of the station",             "uom": "decimal degrees",             "field_type": "Float"         }, {             "field_id": "geoLaenge",              "short_name": "lon",             "long_name": "longitude",             "description": "The longitude position of the station",             "uom": "decimal degrees",             "field_type": "Float"         }, {             "field_id": "Stationsname",              "short_name": "station name",             "long_name": "station name",             "description": "The official name of the station",             "field_type": "String"         }, {             "field_id": "Bundesland",              "short_name": "state",             "long_name": "federal state",             "description": "The federal state",             "field_type": "String"         }]     }, {         "resource_name": ["67a8343f-10aa-4ee2-a601-b0ebd0402894", "e4e8a0f7-dc71-4bcc-9011-5a9cdebf7f23"],         "resource_type": "observations",         "fields": [{             "field_id": "STATIONS_ID",              "short_name": "station identifier",             "long_name": "station identification number",             "description": "The station identification number",             "field_type": "Integer"         }, {             "field_id": "MESS_DATUM",             "short_name": "measurement data",             "long_name": "measurement data",             "description": "The date of the measurement",             "field_type": "Date",             "date_format": "YYYYMMDDhh"         }, {             "field_id": "QUALITAETS_NIVEAU",              "short_name": "quality niveau",             "long_name": "the quality niveau",             "description": "Describes the method of quality control, with which erroneous or suspicious values are identified and set to -999: 1 - only formal control; 2- controlled with individually defined criteria; 3 - automatic control and correction; 5 - historic, subjective procedures; 7 - second control done, before correction; 8 - quality control outside ROUTINE; 9 - not all parameters corrected; 10 - quality control finished, all corrections finished",             "field_type": "Integer"         }, {             "field_id": "STRUKTUR_VERSION",              "short_name": "network id",             "long_name": "network identification",             "description": "identification of the monitoring network",             "field_type": "Integer"         }, {             "field_id": "STUNDENSUMME_SONNENSCHEIN",              "short_name": "sunshine duration",             "long_name": "sunshine duration",             "description": "The sunshine duration in minutes",             "no_data": "-999",             "phenomenon": "sunshine duration",             "uom": "min",             "field_type": "Float"         }]     }] }

groups.description: All informations about Dresden and surroundings

name: sun-dwd
notes: Data about sunshine duration provided by the German Weather Service (DWD)
title: Sun

organization.description: Der Deutsche Wetterdienst (DWD) mit seiner Zentrale in Offenbach am Main ist der nationale meteorologische Dienst der Bundesrepublik Deutschland. Er erbringt meteorologische Dienstleistungen (Wettervorhersage) für die Allgemeinheit oder einzelne Nutzer, wie zum Beispiel die Schifffahrt, die Landwirtschaft oder die Wissenschaft, und betreibt darüber hinaus den Informationsverbund der Bundesverwaltung (IVBV). [siehe Wikipedia](https://de.wikipedia.org/wiki/Deutscher_Wetterdienst)
organization.name: dwd
organization.title: DWD
